SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddPlayerMessage
Represents a client message used to add a player to a lobby.
AllGameMessage
Represents a server message containing the full game state to be sent to the client's view.
AskLobbySizeMessage
Represents a server message requesting the client's view to ask for the lobby size.
AskPlayerInfoMessage
Represents a server message requesting the client's view to ask for player information.
Bag
Class bag, it's the container of all tiles playable during a game.
Board
Class Board, it contains all the method to for player's move in the game.
BoardException
The BoardException class is an abstract class that represents an exception related to the game board.
BoardScout
The BoardScout class implements the Scout interface for observing changes related to the game board.
CantRefillBoardException
The CantRefillBoardException class is an exception that is thrown when the bag does not have enough tiles to refill the game board.
Cell
The Cell class represents a cell containing a Tile and its status.
ChatException
The ChatException class represents an exception that occurs when there is an issue with a chat operation.
ChatMessage
Represents a message sent by a user in a chat room.
ChatRoom
Represents a chat room where users can send and receive messages.
ChatScout
The ChatScout class implements the Scout interface for observing changes related to chat messages.
Cli
This class represents a command-line interface (CLI) for the application.
CliColor
An enumeration representing different ANSI color codes for CLI output styling.
ClientApp
The main client application class responsible for launching the game client.
ClientCommand
An enumeration representing client commands with their associated formats.
ClientHandler
This class it's used to have the complete abstraction between different protocols.
ClientMessage
An abstract base class representing a message from a client to the server.
ClientRMI
The ClientRMI class represents a client's network implementation using RMI for client-server communication.
ClientSocket
The ClientSocket class represents a client's network implementation using Socket for client-server communication.
Color
An enumeration representing colors of the tiles.
ColumnNotValidException
The ColumnNotValidException class is an exception that is thrown when a column is not valid for a player's action.
CommonGoal
The CommonGoal class represents a common goal that can be accomplished by players.
CommonGoalFactory
This class is a factory for common goals.
CommonGoalScout
The CommonGoalScout class implements the Scout interface for observing changes related to common goals.
ConnectionScene
The `ConnectionScene` class represents the scene for establishing a connection to the game server.
Coordinates
Represents the coordinates of a point on a two-dimensional grid.
CrashedPlayerMessage
Represents a server message indicating that a player has crashed or disconnected from the game.
CrossGoal
The CrossGoal class represents a goal where players must create groups of tiles in a cross shape on their shelf.
CurrentPlayer
The CurrentPlayer class represents the current player and the tiles he has selected.
DebugMode
 
DiagonalGoal
The DiagonalGoal class represents a goal where players must create groups of tiles in a cross shape on their shelf.
EndedMatch
The EndedMatch class represents the phase where the match has ended.
EndGameException
The EndGameException class is an exception that is thrown when the game reaches its end phase.
EndGameMessage
Represents a server message indicating the end of the game and providing the final ranking of players.
EndGameScene
The `EndGameScene` class represents the scene that is displayed at the end of the game, showing the final rankings of the players.
EndingStateException
The EndingStateException class is an exception that is thrown when the game is in an ending state.
ErrorMessage
Represents a server message indicating an error occurred during the game.
GameCommand
The GameCommand interface represents a remote interface for player commands.
GameController
The GameController class represents the controller for a game.
GameModel
Represents the game model, contain information about the game state, players, board, and chat.
GamePhaseException
The GamePhaseException class is an abstract class that serves as the base class for game phase-related exceptions.
GameWarning
An enumeration representing game warnings or messages.
GetLobbiesInfoMessage
Represents a client message used to request information about available lobbies.
GroupAdjacentGoal
The GroupAdjacentGoal class represents a goal where players must create groups of adjacent tiles with the same color.
Gui
This class represents a graphic interface for the application.
GuiApplication
The `GuiApplication` class represents the main entry point for the JavaFX-based graphical user interface (GUI) of the application.
InsertTilesMessage
Represents a client message used to insert tiles into the player's shelf.
InvalidInputException
The InvalidInputException class is an exception that is thrown when the input parameters provided by a player are invalid or non-conforming.
LastRoundState
The LastRoundState class represents the phase where the match is in the last round.
LightController
The LightController class handles the input commands and delegates the execution to the corresponding methods.
LivingRoom
The `LivingRoom` class represents the scene that is displayed at the end of the game, showing the final rankings of the players.
Lobby
The Lobby class represents the lobby system in the game server.
LobbyInterface
The LobbyInterface interface represents a remote interface for lobby operations.
LobbyScene
The `LobbyScene` class represents the scene where players can join a lobby and set up the game.
LobbySizeMessage
Represents a client message used to set the size of a lobby.
LoginScene
The `LoginScene` class represents the scene where players can log in and join lobbies or create a new lobby.
LogOutMessage
Represents a client message used for logging out from a lobby.
MockBoard
The MockBoard class represents a mock board object.
MockCommonGoal
The MockCommonGoal class represents a mock common goal object.
MockFactory
It is used to create mock objects of the model, the board, the players and the common goals.
MockModel
The MockModel class represents a lighter version of the model object for the client use.
MockPlayer
The MockPlayer class represents a mock player in the game.
Network
The Network class is an abstract class that represents a network connection for a client application.
NetworkFactory
The NetworkFactory class is a factory class for creating network instances based on the specified network type.
NetworkSettings
The NetworkSettings class provides utility methods to retrieve network settings from a JSON file.
NewTurnMessage
Represents a server message indicating the start of a new turn in the game.
NormalState
The NormalState class represents the phase where the match is in the normal state.
NotYourTurnException
The NotYourTurnException class is an exception that is thrown when a player tries to perform an action when it is not their turn.
NoValidMoveException
The NoValidMoveException class is an exception that is thrown when there are no valid moves available on the game board.
NullPlayerException
The NullPlayerException class is an exception that is thrown when a null player is encountered in the context of a common goal.
NullTileException
The NullTileException class is an exception that is thrown when a null tile is encountered on the game board.
OutcomeInsertTilesMessage
Represents a server message indicating the outcome of the tile insertion operation.
OutcomeLoginMessage
Represents a server message indicating the outcome of a player's login attempt.
OutcomeMessage
Represents a server message indicating a specific outcome or warning in the game.
OutcomeSelectTilesMessage
Represents a server message indicating the outcome of a tile selection operation in the game.
PersonalGoal
The PersonalGoal class represents the personal goal of a player in the game.
PhaseController
The PhaseController class represents the phase where the match is in.
PingMessage
Represents a client message used for sending a ping to the server's lobby.
PingTimer
 
Player
The Player class represents a player in the game.
PlayerException
The PlayerException class is an abstract class that serves as the base class for player-related exceptions.
PlayerNotFoundException
The PlayerNotFoundException class is an exception that is thrown when a player with a specified ID cannot be found.
PlayerScout
The PlayerScout class implements the Scout interface for observing changes related to player objects.
PongMessage
Represents a server message indicating a Pong response from the server.
Rank
The Rank class represents a player with an ID and score.
ReloadPlayerMessage
Represents a server message indicating that a player needs to be reloaded in the game.
RemoteClient
The RemoteClient interface represents a remote interface for a client.
RemoteView
This interface defines the remote view for the game client.
RowColumnGoal
The RowColumnGoal class represents a goal where players must create row or column of tile with a different pattern.
SameNGoal
The SameNGoal class represents a goal where a player must have a certain number of tiles of the same color on their shelf to achieve the goal.
Scout<O>
The Scout interface represents a remote interface for updating objects.
SelectedTilesMessage
Represents a client message used to indicate the selected tiles by a player in the game.
ServerApp
The ServerApp class represents the main entry point for the server application.
ServerMessage
An abstract base class representing a message from the server to the client.
ServerRMI
The ServerRMI class represents the server that listens for incoming RMI connections.
Shelf
 
SocketHandler
This class represents the handler for each socket connection It implements all the method that the server can call also on an RMI connection
SocketServer
The SocketServer class represents the server that listens for incoming socket connections.
SquareGoal
The DoubleSquare class represents a goal where players must create groups of tiles in a cross shape on their shelf.
StaircaseGoal
The Staircase class represents a goal where players must create a staircase on their shelf.
Talent
The Talent class represents a collection of scouts that can receive updates.
Tile
The Tile class represents a colored tile used in the game.
TurnPhase
An enumeration representing different phases of a player's turn in a game.
UpdateMessage
Represents a server message that updates the client's view with new information.
VerticesGoal
The VerticesGoal class represents a goal where players must have a tile on the vertice of the shelf.
View
Abstract class representing a view in the game.
ViewFactory
Factory class for creating instances of different views.
WriteChatMessage
Represents a client message used to write a chat message in the game.
